PositionHistory.Description:
Feb-2018   Till-Date
Bengaluru, IN
Portfolio Management
Project Management Office
Strategic Management
Stakeholder Management
Agile Scrum Management

PositionHistory.Title: Scrum Master
PositionHistory.Description:
Digital Banking - Digital Customer Experience - Oct/2018 to Till-Date
•	Manage Account Aggregator (UK Open Banking) feature within Mobile Banking 3.0 as Scrum Master - running
scrum events, preparing & tracking project schedule, defining & monitoring milestones, grooming backlog,
removing blockers for the project delivery
• Established & drove the adoption of agile frameworks & tools. Drove the team to follow the Organization established development practices.
• Work with Product Manager to understand the Product Vision, Objectives & maintain backlog by drafting the User Epics & Stories using JIRA tool
• Team Management of 5-10 Associates (.Net & React-Native Developers, BA & Tester)
• Hands-on Tech Management to guide the team through the Technology Landscape & manage the dependencies & risks

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 60% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Publish periodic executive
PositionHistory.Description:
Feb/2018  to Sep/2018
•	Manage the investment governance process and operating mechanisms for portfolio demand management, to facilitate planning resourcing requirements and prioritization
• Set appropriate goals and priorities that coordinate with key business partners, other organizational units and third party resources
• Understand and articulate the value for business in project and portfolio management with the Stakeholders across the Cross Functional team in the Bank
• Oversight of project/Task milestones/objectives, risk and mitigation, and the delivery/completion in a matrix structure using Agile Development Methodologies
•	Manage a budget of $15-20M for IT Small to Medium complex projects & Coordinate yearly investment planning
across service owners in the portfolio.
•	Publish periodic executive Task Management summary status reports


Fidelity Investments Management & Research India (FMR LLC India) - IT Project Manager - Program Management
• Led creation of Program Management Office(PMO) for Data Center of Excellence of 120-140 associates spreading across India Locations
• Support BU Head & Account Directors with Project Deliverables, Lead generation & follow-ups and Partner-Presentations.
• Conduct Project/Engagement reviews regularly; Plan & engage stakeholders/Partners at the regular intervals
• Plan & organize the Tech Talks, Trainings & Interactions within the group to encourage the Knowledge sharing
• Business Analyst  - Machine Learning
• Donning the Scrum Master role, performing the below responsibilities:
1. Planned and managed work activities of a software development Team (Web Portal, Customer Onboarding) working closely in conjunction with business teams.
2. Developed and followed and implemented improvements for Agile Project Management Plan (Agile Ceremonies).
3. Monitored Project Progress and radiated the information to Stakeholders. Identified and mitigated Team risks and impediments (Blocking issues, Critical Defects) on daily basis.
4. Coached team members on agile processes and facilitated planning meetings and retrospectives. Maintained Task board, and produced Daily Burndown charts

Wipro Ltd - Lead Consultant/Manager - Program Management
• Enterprise Program Management Office (PMO) drives initiatives across Verticals to align it to the delivery across the $2.5+ Billion worth Service Line.
• Drive periodic reviews on Existing Accounts - Early warning, Program Governance, CSAT, Escalation Management, People drives, Cost of Delivery (Goal 40%), Automation and Process improvement, People Management.
• Drive periodic reviews of New Accounts on their Delivery readiness, Start Green & Stay Green processes, Interlocks discussions with Verticals, People assignment.
• Interact with Cross Functional teams - Finance, HR, Competency, Work Force Management Group, Quality, Tools & Automation - to drive through the Operations across the SBU
• Provide regular updates to CXOs & participate on the reviews of Service Line's New & Existing Accounts.
• Work with Service Line Head to have a clear view of the Account Landscapes, initiate the Org Level initiatives and drive them to close.
• Passionate about Program Planning, Customer Engagement to align Delivery with their IT & Business Strategy
• Assist Cluster Delivery Heads in reviewing their business, Strategies & cost-of-delivery
• Lead a team of 5 to review our Contracts across the Service Line, convert them into trackable actions & coordinate with Account teams to track them periodically.


ANZ Support Services - Senior Analyst
Technical & Business Consulting:
• Performed Technical Consulting to implement the Mainframe & SQL Server solutions
• Assisted Senior Manager in implementing the Global Financial Simplification Strategy across MIS Team by suggesting and implementing the Process Improvements.
• Created Documentation for the Processes handled, Handled Transition to Chengdu and from Melbourne, Trained cross teams on Mainframe basics.
• Participated as Technical Lead in Multiple Stabilization projects towards Technology Strategy of the Organization. Used it as a platform to reengineer how the current work is done.

Bank of America Continuum Solutions, Analyst
Technical & Business Consulting:
• Performed Technical Consulting to implement the Mainframe solutions
• Performed Production Support & Application Support work.
• Performed as a Developer to upgrade the 3rd Party Infor Legacy Systems to the Infor version 9.1.

Satyam Computer Services Ltd - Systems Analyst
Technical & Business Consulting:
• Performed Technical Consulting to implement the Mainframe solutions
• Performed Mainframe Decommissioning, Application Support & Management, & also worked as Onsite Coordinator.
• Participated as Technical Lead in Multiple Stabilization projects towards Technology Strategy of the Organization. Used it as a platform to reengineer how the current work is done.
• Participated in Requirement gathering, Development and Maintenance of Mainframe Applications & managed the Decommissioning of Mainframe Application, Lead a team of 5 at offshore and had worked as Onsite Coordinator.

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
Harshavardhana M R
IT Project Manager | Harsha's LinkedIn Profile
harsha.rangashamaiah@gmail.com	|   +91 8861776600

Summary

15+ years of experience in Technology Development, IT Project/Program/Portfolio/Delivery Management, Service Delivery, Mainframes & SQL Server implementations in Retail, Manufacturing, & Banking domains, Business Analysis, Financial/Cost Management.

Certification: Project Management Professional (PMP #1620069) - Certified
Professional Scrum Master -1 (PSM1) - In-Progress to get Certified

Experience Highlights

• Well experienced in Software Project Management, Development, Testing, Production Support, Client & Vendor on-boarding & relationship Management
• Has extensive working experience on domains like Banking & Financial Services(7Yrs+), Retail(1.5Yrs+), Manufacturing(2.5Yrs+) domains
• Responsible for Project Management & Planning, Time & Cost Management, Customer Management, Quality Management, People Management, Stakeholder & Procurement Management
• Well experienced in Agile & Scrum methodologies, Resource Plan, Management Reports creation
• Worked in Onsite location in United States as Onsite Coordinator/Systems Analyst for Scoping & SRS, Proposal, Prototype to Customer, Design & Technical document translation from Portuguese to English for Retail Home Office Systems

Education

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Harshavardhana M R's experience appears to be mostly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Project Management) and slightly concentrated in Finance (mostly Real Estate & Facilities). Harshavardhana M R has 15 years of work experience, with 5 years of management experience, including a somewhat high-level position.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = IN; Culture.DefaultCultureIsIndia = True; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
